Interface ComponentGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelegatingComponentGenerator

    public interface ComponentGenerator

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void generateComponentXML(File inputFile, File outputFile)
      Generate a component XML file based on the java code found at the source path and save it to the output file.

    • Method Detail

      • generateComponentXML

        void generateComponentXML(File inputFile,
                        File outputFile)
                          throws Exception
        Generate a component XML file based on the java code found at the source path and save it to the output file. Use componentId and version in the component XML required tags. The component category will be used as category of the generated services.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - The original component XML file, if any.
        outputFile - The output file to save the component XML in
        Throws:
        Exception - TODO you know what!
